macroSpec.desc: defines the range of attribute values used to identify a particular combination of human language and writing system
definisce la gamma di valori di attributi usati per identificare una determinata combinazione di linguaggio e sistema di scrittura umani

remarks.p:
The values for this attribute are language tags as defined in RFC 3066 or its successor. Examples include sn
Shonazh-TW
Taiwaneseen-SL
English as spoken in Sierra Leonepl
Polishes-MX
Spanish as spoken in Mexico
